availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James R. Shingleton (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Shingleton. Married to Mary E. Burgess Shingleton in Harrison County, Kentucky, on January 27, 1858. Married to Melvina Bowen Shingleton in Harrison County in November 1865. Farmer for John Shingleton in Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 120A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 495.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #001690281, p. 168.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #000216898, p. 85.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Harrison County Deaths, Roll #7012977, #593.
